p: Given their rarity, little is known about ethnic variation in the main recessive causes of PD such as parkin and DJ1, but a variant of PINK1 is known to have a higher carrier frequency in Filipinos [ 130]. It is important to note that spinocerebellar ataxia type 3 can present in Black patients with parkinsonism and levodopa responsiveness that can be clinically identical to idiopathic PD [ 131].
